ECSchema.description: The GeologicalModel schema defines classes that represent data for interpreting the earth's subterranean structure

ECEntityClass.description: A specialized Analytical Partition advertising a Geologic model (interpretation) based on Fault Blocks partitioned by one or more Fault Surfaces.
An AnalyticalModel specialization expected to contain GeologicElement3d instances at different granularities.
An AnalyticalElement serving as common base class for all element-classes modeling Geological concepts.
A GeologicElement3d modeling a set of volumes and surfaces that may be partitioned by one or more Fault Surfaces
A GeologicElement3d modeling a Volume of a particular Category. Categories commonly represent Lithology.
A GeologicElement3d modeling a surface between two or more Category Volumes.
A GeologicElement3d modeling a surface that describes a Fault that partitions a Geological Model.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A relationship between a ContactSurface and an adjacent GeologicalCategoryVolume.
